016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
019import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.*;
020import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
021import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
024import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
027import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
028import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
029
030import java.io.File;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.nio.file.*;
033import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
034import java.util.*;
035import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
036import java.util.stream.Stream;
037
038import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.testResourcesModuleToAetherArtifact;
039import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.toClasspathFiles;
040import static java.util.stream.Stream.concat;
041
042/**
043 * Utility class to stop Test Resources service.
044 */
045public class TestResourcesHelper {
046
047    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES = "test-resources.properties";
048    private static final String PORT_FILE_NAME = "test-resources-port.txt";
049
050    private final boolean enabled;
051
052    private final boolean keepAlive;
053
054    private final boolean shared;
055
056    private final File buildDirectory;
057
058    private final Log log;
059
060    private Integer explicitPort;
061
062    private Integer clientTimeout;
063
064    private MavenProject mavenProject;
065
066    private MavenSession mavenSession;
067
068    private DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
069
070    private ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
071
072    private String testResourcesVersion;
073
074    private boolean classpathInference;
075
076    private List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies;
077
078    private String sharedServerNamespace;
079
080    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled, boolean keepAlive, boolean shared, File buildDirectory,
081                               Integer explicitPort, Integer clientTimeout, MavenProject mavenProject,
082                               MavenSession mavenSession, DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService,
083                               ToolchainManager toolchainManager, String testResourcesVersion,
084                               boolean classpathInference, List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies,
085                               String sharedServerNamespace) {
086        this(enabled, keepAlive, shared, buildDirectory);
087        this.explicitPort = explicitPort;
088        this.clientTimeout = clientTimeout;
089        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
090        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
091        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
092        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
093        this.testResourcesVersion = testResourcesVersion;
094        this.classpathInference = classpathInference;
095        this.testResourcesDependencies = testResourcesDependencies;
096        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
097    }
098
099    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled, boolean keepAlive, boolean shared, File buildDirectory) {
100        this.enabled = enabled;
101        this.keepAlive = keepAlive;
102        this.shared = shared;
103        this.buildDirectory = buildDirectory;
104        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * Starts the Test Resources Service.
109     */
110    public void start() throws MojoExecutionException {
111        if (!enabled) {
112            return;
113        }
114        try {
115            doStart();
116        } catch (Exception e) {
117            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to start test resources server", e);
118        }
119    }
120
121    private void doStart() throws IOException {
122        if (shared) {
123            if (sharedServerNamespace != null) {
124                log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode with the namespace: " + sharedServerNamespace);
125            } else {
126                log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode");
127            }
128        }
129        String accessToken = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
130        Path buildDir = buildDirectory.toPath();
131        Path serverSettingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
132        AtomicBoolean serverStarted = new AtomicBoolean(false);
133        ServerFactory serverFactory = new DefaultServerFactory(log, toolchainManager, mavenSession, serverStarted);
134        startOrConnectToExistingServer(accessToken, buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory, serverFactory);
135        if (serverStarted.get()) {
136            if (keepAlive) {
137                log.info("Micronaut Test Resources service is started in the background. To stop it, run the following command: 'mvn mn:" + StopTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME + "'");
138            }
139        } else {
140            // A server was already listening, which means it was running before
141            // the build was started, so we put a file to indicate to the stop
142            // mojo that it should not stop the server.
143            Path keepalive = getKeepAliveFile();
144            Files.write(keepalive, "true".getBytes());
145        }
146        // In order for the test resources client to connect, we need
147        // to copy the test resources file to the test classes directory
148        copyServerSettingsToClasspath(buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory);
149    }
150
151    private void startOrConnectToExistingServer(String accessToken, Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory, ServerFactory serverFactory) {
152        try {
153            ServerUtils.startOrConnectToExistingServer(
154                    explicitPort,
155                    buildDir.resolve(PORT_FILE_NAME),
156                    serverSettingsDirectory,
157                    accessToken,
158                    resolveServerClasspath(),
159                    clientTimeout,
160                    serverFactory
161            );
162        } catch (Exception e) {
163            log.error("Error starting Micronaut Test Resources service", e);
164        }
165    }
166
167    private void copyServerSettingsToClasspath(Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory) throws IOException {
168        Path testClassesDir = buildDir.resolve("test-classes");
169        if (!Files.exists(testClassesDir)) {
170            Files.createDirectories(testClassesDir);
171        }
172        Files.copy(serverSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES), testClassesDir.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
173    }
174
175    private List<File> resolveServerClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
176        Stream<Artifact> clientDependencies = Stream.of(testResourcesModuleToAetherArtifact("client", testResourcesVersion));
177
178        List<MavenDependency> applicationDependencies = Collections.emptyList();
179        if (classpathInference) {
180            applicationDependencies = getApplicationDependencies();
181        }
182        Stream<Artifact> serverDependencies =
183                TestResourcesClasspath.inferTestResourcesClasspath(applicationDependencies, testResourcesVersion)
184                        .stream()
185                        .map(DependencyResolutionService::testResourcesDependencyToAetherArtifact);
186
187        List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> extraDependencies =
188                testResourcesDependencies != null ? testResourcesDependencies : Collections.emptyList();
189
190        Stream<Artifact> extraDependenciesStream = extraDependencies.stream()
191                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact);
192
193        Stream<Artifact> artifacts = concat(concat(clientDependencies, serverDependencies), extraDependenciesStream);
194
195        return toClasspathFiles(dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(artifacts, true));
196    }
197
198    private List<MavenDependency> getApplicationDependencies() {
199        return this.mavenProject.getDependencies().stream()
200                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToTestResourcesDependency)
201                .toList();
202    }
203
204    /**
205     * Contains the logic to stop the Test Resources Service.
206     */
207    public void stop() throws MojoExecutionException {
208        if (!enabled || Boolean.TRUE.equals(keepAlive)) {
209            return;
210        }
211        if (Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile())) {
212            try {
213                Files.delete(getKeepAliveFile());
214            } catch (IOException e) {
215                throw new MojoExecutionException("Failed to delete keepalive file", e);
216            }
217            return;
218        }
219        try {
220            Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = ServerUtils.readServerSettings(getServerSettingsDirectory());
221            if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent() && ServerUtils.isServerStarted(optionalServerSettings.get().getPort())) {
222                log.info("Shutting down Micronaut Test Resources service");
223                doStop();
224            }
225        } catch (Exception e) {
226            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to stop test resources server", e);
227        }
228    }
229
230    private void doStop() throws IOException {
231        Path settingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
232        ServerUtils.stopServer(settingsDirectory);
233        Files.walkFileTree(settingsDirectory, new SimpleFileVisitor<>() {
234            @Override
235            public FileVisitResult visitFile(Path file, BasicFileAttributes attrs) throws IOException {
236                Files.delete(file);
237                return super.visitFile(file, attrs);
238            }
239
240            @Override
241            public FileVisitResult postVisitDirectory(Path dir, IOException exc) throws IOException {
242                Files.delete(dir);
243                return super.postVisitDirectory(dir, exc);
244            }
245        });
246    }
247
248    private Path getServerSettingsDirectory() {
249        if (shared) {
250            return ServerUtils.getDefaultSharedSettingsPath(sharedServerNamespace);
251        }
252        return serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
253    }
254
255    private Path getKeepAliveFile() {
256        return getServerSettingsDirectory().resolve("keepalive");
257    }
258
259    private Path serverSettingsDirectoryOf(Path buildDir) {
260        return buildDir.resolve("../.micronaut/test-resources");
261    }
262
263    /**
264     * @param sharedServerNamespace The shared server namespace (if any).
265     */
266    public void setSharedServerNamespace(String sharedServerNamespace) {
267        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
268    }
269}
